match up.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to put two people or things together that are related to or suitable for each other
match up.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The employment agency exists to match up graduates and IT companies.
My mother spent her life trying to match me up with various women.
match up.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if two things match up, they seem the same or are connected in some way
match up.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Their accounts just don’t match up.
The DNA samples found on her body did not match up with a sample taken from the accused.
match up.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to be as good as you hoped, expected etc
match up.translation[0].definitions[2].e: Unfortunately, the product’s performance did not match up to the manufacturer’s promise.
